stories.author: Mohammad Jamali
stories.title: From hours to minutes with better retention
stories.quote: 2Sentences saved me a lot of time! What used to take hours now takes minutes.

stories.author: Alex Rivera
stories.title: 80% less prep time for podcast research
stories.quote: I manage 12+ hours of daily podcast research. 2Sentences cuts my prep time by 80% while ensuring I never miss key insights from competitors' shows.

stories.author: Nadia Petrova
stories.title: Doubled engagement with audio previews
stories.quote: Channel engagement doubled after introducing 2Sentences previews - subscribers now consume 30-minute voice notes more efficiently by reading the AI summaries first.

statistics.title: Transforming Content Consumption, Efficiency at Scale
statistics.description: DoJomle revolutionizes how you consume digital content by distilling hours of audio/video into powerful 2-sentence insights

motivation.title: DoJomle: Your AI-Powered Summarization Expert
motivation.description: Our system uses advanced NLP models to extract core insights from YouTube videos, Telegram voice channels, Castbox podcasts and more - delivering knowledge in seconds, not hours
